item.title: Swing VPN app is a DDOS botnet
item.description: tldr: Swing VPN is using its user base to DDOS sites using its users as a an attack botnet. new: Some people wrote me saying that the DDOS is not happening on ios devices. Just did a quick check and you guys are right. iOS app is using different way to do VPN and also does not do anything suspicious. I should appologize to you and to Appstore team for my lazy extrapolation without actually checking it.

item.title: Init
item.description: About me Hello I do like doing crazy experiments and testing new stuff. Mail: I personally prefer a mail hosting in proton.me and my favourite handle there is ’lecromee'. In case you like math, here are my favorite numbers. Bitcoin: 19ELnxocZnqwjUipL8jmMsF78BxWnypRP Etherium: abc002968B6576cf2391fddE3EFC3d10D78bFd56
